title: Lagging without ethernet cable, need help!
body:
So about 2 weeks ago my ping randomly kept spiking really high (usually ~600), i ran antivirus scans an malware scans but nothing came up.
It ended up being packet loss and i was suggested to use an Ethernet cable. 
The Ethernet cable worked and my ping was a solid 29, however i usually play in my room where i can Skype my friends an it wont annoy anyone, and where i have desk an chair to play on. The only place where i can attach my laptop to an Ethernet cable is my second sitting room where i have to lie down and play on the floor.

I was wondering how i can fix this an not have to use an Ethernet every time i play in order to prevent ping spikes. 
_(so i can play on my comfortable chair and use my desk instead of lying down on the floor)_

Should re-install league? would that help?

If you need any more information let me know, hope you can help!
Thanks in advance :D

**_Solved_**
I re-installed the game.

replies.body:
Hey there,

You might have luck with removing anything that could be causing any interference between you and your router, moving closer to the router, etc.

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=9Xwipav8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-07T06:49:10.962+0000)
>
> Hey there,
> 
> You might have luck with removing anything that could be causing any interference between you and your router, moving closer to the router, etc.

Ill give it a go and get back to you when my league actually starts xD
Thanks!
